channel.title: “A Cool and Lonely Courage” kickstarter now live!
channel.description:
I’ve now launched the 21 day kickstarter campaign for “A Cool and Lonely Courage”
You can watch it being played by Gauntleteers on this YouTube video, ably facilitated by @AviatrixCat to whom I’m very grateful.
https://m.youtube.com/watch?feature=youtu.be&v=wW9YG3FnL6Y
I would love it if you decided to show your support by backing it on the page here:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lonely-courage/a-cool-and-lonely-courage?ref=project_build
Thank you for reading!
Alex

item.title: “A Cool and Lonely Courage” kickstarter now live!
item.dc:creator: @Alex
item.description:
@Alex wrote:

Well, I’m happy to say that it funded in just three hours, and overnight has reached its first stretch goal, the campaign mode, which allows the game to tell the story of a number of women throughout the war. In the campaign mode you will have more time to get to know your people, and there is no certainty about when your time will run out…

Read full topic
item.source: “A Cool and Lonely Courage” kickstarter now live!

item.title: “A Cool and Lonely Courage” kickstarter now live!
item.dc:creator: @Alex
item.description:
@Alex wrote:

I’ve now launched the 21 day kickstarter campaign for “A Cool and Lonely Courage”

You can watch it being played by Gauntleteers on this YouTube video, ably facilitated by @AviatrixCat to whom I’m very grateful.

I would love it if you decided to show your support by backing it on the page here:

Kickstarter

A Cool and Lonely Courage

A table top story game about the heroic women of the SOE in occupied France for 2-5 players.

Thank you for reading!

Alex
